text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Look around you.  Trump is going out of his way to help the Coronavirus kill Americans.  He’s checked out of the crisis and publicly raved that the Federal Government was the “back-up” for the states.  He’s told us that a quarter million dead would mean he did a good job. Go NP !
